module.title: Info: Pages
module.description: Support for static pages and automatic routing to them.
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>pages`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>pages` ( `pageId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `parentId` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `status` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', `type` tinyint(4) DEFAULT '0', `scope` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `rank` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `identifier` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `module` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `content` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `timestamp` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`pageId`), KEY `scope` (`scope`), KEY `key` (`identifier`), KEY `parentId` (`parentId`), KEY `type` (`type`), KEY `module` (`module`), KEY `status` (`status`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
